Name: Chancellor Maximillian Liao
Details:
Born 2964.

The current Chancellor of the Capellan Confederation, Maximillian rose to power in 2992 by poisoning his father. He then expanded his control over the military and the secret police, the Maskirovka, and in 3015 gave support to Anton Marik during the civil war between him and his brother Janos, although his main enemy is still Hanse Davion and the Federated Suns. His eldest daughter, Candace, is the heir-apparent after Maximillian became displeasured with his only son, Tormana, and his youngest daughter, Romano, is also known to have ambitions to the Celestial Throne.
